revised_title: A Novel Method for Drawing Conic Curves
tldr: The authors present a new apparatus for drawing conic curves using a four-bar linkage and a rotating paper. The method involves the polar reciprocal of a circle, with the focus of the conic being the center of reciprocation. The apparatus allows for easy adjustment of the latus rectum and eccentricity of the conic, making it a versatile tool for drawing conic sections.
